about_the_game:
Grim World is a survival and adventure game in which you can build your home, create your character and shape it to your liking . You can become a warrior, a hunter or even a magician.

The equipment you wear will improve your skill, you may well be halfway between a hunter and a magician or a thief or any combination you wish.

Many creatures as well as many resources are recoverable in order to create your equipment.

You will be able to improve your equipment throughout your journey and at the same time venture into a more dangerous world.

Some hidden place will allow you to sell your equipment and resources in order to earn gold!

This game was created by a single person with the help of Unreal Ungine 5 and who had no basic competence in this area.

The game is therefore in early access and could have modifications throughout your journey.
